## MarkdownRenderChild.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `MarkdownRenderChild` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(containerEl: HTMLElement);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  containerEl | HTMLElement | This HTMLElement will be used to test whether this component is still alive. It should be a child of the markdown preview sections, and when it's no longer attached (for example, when it is replaced with a new version because the user edited the markdown source code), this component will be unloaded. |
